name: expandtestingcypressjavascript
description: This is Automation Project for Automating various projects for Cypress.

scripts.mochawesome-merge: npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.RunAllAPI-with-MochawesomeReports: npm run delete-results && npm run delete-mochawesome-report && npm run triggerAllTests-API && npm run mochawesome-merge

author: Taimoor Pasha
